decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan) Page 1 of 8; 02 (Existing First Floor Plan) Page 2 of 8; 03 (Existing Roof Floor Plan) Page 3 of 8; 04 - Revision A (Existing Elevations) Page 4 of 8; 05 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan) Page 5 of 8; 06 (Proposed First Floor Plan) Page 6 of 8; 07 - Revision A (Proposed Loft / Roof Plan) Page 7 of 8; 08 - Revision B (Proposed Elevations) Page 8 of 8; Site Location Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse on site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Part single and part two storey rear extension; first floor side extension; roof extension to incorporate a flat crown and rear facing dormer; and the installation of three rooflights to the side roof slope
